questions: What is COPRA ? When was is introduced ?
answers: Consumer Protection Act is popularly known as COPRA. It was introduced by the Government of India in 1986.

questions: On which day of the year is ‘National Consumers Day’ celebrated in India?
answers: In India, National Consumers Day is celebrated on 24th December every year.

questions: Why was the Consumer Protection Act enacted by the Indian Parliament ?
answers: To protect the consumers from unfair trade practices and retains the interest of consumers at large.
